options.text: It is strongly recommended to not use West Europe for large VM deployments, due to limited resource availability. It is fine to use West Europe for AVD Metadata.

elements.name: avdMetadataLocation
elements.label: AVD metadata region
elements.toolTip: AVD metadata resources can only be deployed to specific regions. Select a supported region close to your main deployment region.

elements.name: resourceGroupName
elements.label: Base resource group name
elements.toolTip: A new resource group for base infrastructure will be deployed. You can configure the name of the resource group here.

elements.name: dnsZoneName
elements.label: AVD subdomain
elements.toolTip: Schoolyear AVD requires a subdomain hosted by your organisation. Later, you will need to request a wildcard certificate on this subdomain.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid domain name (e.g., schoolyearavd.contoso.com)
Please enter a valid Key Vault name. The name must be 3-24 characters long, and may contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

infoMessages.text: This name must be globally unique, across all of Azure

elements.name: resourceGroupName
elements.label: Network resource group
elements.toolTip: A new resource group for network resources will be deployed. You can configure the name of the resource group here.

elements.name: natName
elements.label: NAT name
elements.toolTip: A new NAT will be deployed to route outgoing traffic. You can configure the name of the NAT resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

elements.name: natIpName
elements.label: NAT IP address name
elements.toolTip: A new public IP will be created for outgoing traffic. You can configure the name of the IP address resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

options.text: A new VNet will be deployed. This network will be used to connect the sessionhosts used during exams. If students need access to license servers or other internal services, make sure you pick a network range that is still available within your organisation.

elements.name: vnetName
elements.label: VNet name
elements.toolTip: A new VNet will be created. You can configure the name of the resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 2-64 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

elements.name: vnetSubnetCIDR
elements.label: VNet IP range
elements.toolTip: A new VNet will be created. You can configure the IP range here.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid IPv4 CIDR range (e.g. 10.0.0.0/19)

options.text: Manually verify that the subnets you configure here are in the VNet's address space and do not overlap with each other. This is not validated automatically, but it will result in a deployment failure.

elements.name: sessionhostsSubnetName
elements.label: Sessionhosts subnet
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to sessionhosts. You can configure the name of the subnet here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

elements.name: sessionhostsSubnetCIDR
elements.label: Sessionhosts subnet IP range
elements.subLabel: One address must be available for each student taking an exam at the same time
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to sessionhosts. You can configure the IP range of the subnet here.

validations.message: Please enter a valid IPv4 CIDR range (e.g. 10.0.0.0/20)

elements.name: servicesSubnetName
elements.label: Services subnet
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to network services. You can configure the name of the subnet here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

elements.name: servicesSubnetCIDR
elements.label: Services subnet IP range
elements.subLabel: Range must be 5-10x the number of the maximum concurrent exams
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to network services. You can configure the IP range of the subnet here.

validations.message: Please enter a valid IPv4 CIDR range (e.g. 10.0.0.0/20)

elements.name: avdSubnetName
elements.label: AVD subnet
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to AVD services. You can configure the name of the subnet here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 characters: Alphanumerics, underscores, periods, and hyphens. Start with alphanumeric. End with alphanumeric or underscore.

elements.name: avdSubnetCIDR
elements.label: AVD subnet IP range
elements.subLabel: Range must be 4x the number of the maximum concurrent exams
elements.toolTip: The VNet will have a subnet dedicated to AVD services. You can configure the IP range of the subnet here.

validations.message: Please enter a valid IPv4 CIDR range (e.g. 10.0.0.0/20)

elements.name: resourceGroupName
elements.label: Image building resource group
elements.toolTip: A new resource group for image building will be deployed. You can configure the name of the resource group here.

options.text: Images used in AVD will be stored in an Image Gallery. The gallery can contain multiple image definitions. To get you started, this template creates one by default. If you want to create more images yourself later, you can through the Azure Portal.

elements.name: galleryName
elements.label: Gallery name
elements.toolTip: A new Image Gallery will be created. You can configure the name of the resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 Alphanumerics and periods. Start and end with alphanumeric.

elements.name: imageName
elements.label: Default image name
elements.toolTip: A new image version will be created to get started quickly. This is usually an Office 365 image. You can configure the name of the resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 1-80 Alphanumerics, underscores, hyphens, and periods. Start and end with alphanumeric.

options.text: This template will create a new storage account to store files required during the image building process, such as MSIs.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid Storage Account name. The name must be 3-24 characters long, and may contain only lowercase letters and numbers.

infoMessages.text: This name must be globally unique, across all of Azure

elements.name: containerName
elements.label: Container name
elements.toolTip: A new container will be created in the storage account. You can configure the name of the resource here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 3-64 Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens. Start with lowercase letter or number. Can't use consecutive hyphens.

options.text: This template will create a new Managed Identity and assign a custom role to it, to use during automated image building.

constraints.validationMessage: Please enter a valid Key Vault name. The name must be 3-128 characters long, and may contain alphanumerics, hyphens, and underscores. Start with a letter or number.

elements.name: roleName
elements.label: Custom role name
elements.toolTip: A new role will be created to assign to the managed identity. You can configure the name of the role here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 3-64 letters, numbers, and hyphens. Start and end with letter or number. Can't use consecutive hyphens.

options.text: This template will create a custom role for the app registration service principal. This role provides the necessary permissions to deploy and delete exam environments.

elements.name: appRegistrationCustomRoleName
elements.label: App registration custom role name
elements.toolTip: A custom role will be created for the app registration service principal to manage exam deployments. You can configure the name of the role here.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be 3-64 letters, numbers, and hyphens. Start and end with letter or number. Can't use consecutive hyphens.
